text: @realDonaldTrump If it's safe to mail in Tax Returns, receive Tax Refunds, Social Security Checks, Stimulus Checks, Draft Registrations, Rx Drugs, your Driver's License, Passport, & Voter Card THEN IT'S SAFE TO VOTE BY MAIL.  Americans aren't going to let Covid19 stop the vote #VoteByMail2020
